recipesJson.name: Poolside
recipesJson.author: DIYDownunderPippa
recipesJson.description:
The Baja Soda at this percentage offers a great start to offer some of those refreshing blue tones you get in drinks like powerade ect. It also gives a little citrus which can complement almost any style of light fruity beverage profile IMO. 
The hero here is the delicious Blueberry lemonade Slushie. The blue razz tones are so similar to those blue slurpees and the lemonade offers an almost bubbly mouthfeel which really assists this over all profile with the right level of sweetness and a slight cool note offers some refreshment. While the Baja Soda ? Blueberry lemonade slushie are almost good stand alone, together they are a happy marriage. 
However I really wanted to add a little bit of a tropical mouthfeel to this profile without getting to complicated. IMO nothing adds a little "tropical" to a beverage profile better than the delectable ? delightful Flavorah Pink Guava. This stuff alone takes you to an oasis with pink flamingos lol. 
Seriously though the contrasting tones of flavor against the refreshing blue ? citrus notes seemingly work beautifully. A couple of extra cubes of ice (hence 0.5% ws-23 30%) and this one is going to be perfect on the sundeck as we sit poolside relaxing and enjoying this vape. 
At least this is what I get and feel from this lovely little recipe. 
What did you get? Did you enjoy it? 
Let me know your thoughts and most of all just enjoy mixing ? DIY because it's the best creative artform in the world!!

reviews.text: I needed to mix something for my sister and this is exactly her type of vape. Right after I mixed it up I tried it because I was curious. Needless to say she hasn't tried it to this day. I vaped the entire 30ml in a day and a half.
